message: Perhaps a star icon could appear on mouseover next to each topic name in the recent topic list and the group's main page.

Stars on Convore seem like a good idea that just needs a little polish to become actually useful. For example: it would be great to have a way to quickly view the starred messages in each topic. Sort of a way to filter a topic for only the starred messages. AgileBits is thinking about using this as a way to make it easy to catch up on just the important pieces of each conversation.
but only if messages were starred in that topic.
After all, we are already being ranked by our stars; why not facilitate viewing the starred messages themselves.
Otherwise we are just sneeches. http://www.shorpy.com/files/sneetches.gif
